TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項之 、 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別用於， ， ，和方法，以提供傳遞給的輸入參數的存取權， ， ，和方法控制項。The class is used in the , , , and methods to provide access to input parameters that are passed to the , , , and methods of the control. 這些參數用來存取屬性。These parameters are accessed using the property. 藉由新增委派以處理， ， ，或事件，您可以檢查和操作參數的值並執行任何其他前置處理所需。By adding a delegate to handle the , , , or event, you can examine and manipulate the values of the parameters and perform any additional preprocessing that is required. 這個字典中參數的任何變更會影響作業呼叫的方法多載。Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation. 當屬性控制項設定時，您只能修改資料物件屬性，此字典中的項目; 您無法加入或移除參數。When the property of the control is set, you can only modify the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 控制項不僅會公開許多您可以控制它們來使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間的事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle. 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯類別和事件處理常式委派。The following table lists the events and associated classes and event handler delegates. |Event - 事件Event|`EventArgs` 類別`EventArgs` class|事件處理常式委派EventHandler delegate| |-----------|-----------------------|---------------------------| |。.

發生於之前建立的商務物件執行個體。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在建立商務物件的執行個體之後，就會發生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

擷取資料之前發生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

Insert、 update 或 delete 作業執行之前發生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

發生於之後擷取的資料。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

插入、 更新或刪除作業已完成之後發生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在商務物件被終結之前發生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例會使用範例中介層商務物件。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始會顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制，請按一下**插入** 按鈕，而屬性會識別哪一種方法執行動作。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button, and the property will identify which method performs the action. 在此範例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用來執行插入; 不過，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`來插入資料的參數。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 基於這個理由，集合的字串，控制項將會自動是不夠的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委派處理物件事件可讓您操作之前輸入的參數和作業會繼續進行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因為`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`物件做為參數，其中會使用字串集合來建立並加入至集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例會使用範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 下列清單描述在程式碼範例中所定義的兩個主要類別：The following list describes the two major classes that are defined in the code example: - `EmployeeLogic`類別，這是無狀態的類別封裝商務邏輯。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別，這是包含只需要以載入保存資料與資料層的基本功能的模型類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 此外，`NorthwindDataException`提供類別是為了方便起見。In addition, a `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 這組範例類別會使用 Northwind Traders 資料庫，這是適用於 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 範例資料庫。This set of example classes uses the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 如需完整的工作範例，請使用這些類別，將它們放在應用程式根目錄底下的 App_Code 目錄或藉由編譯它們，並將產生的 DLL 放在 Bin 目錄。For a complete working example, use these classes by placing them in the App_Code directory under the application root or by compiling them and placing the resulting DLL in the Bin directory. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全實作，因此您會將資料插入 Northwind Traders 資料庫時嘗試使用這個範例。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary inputParameters) cil managed

param.name: inputParameters
param.span: 物件的 ，表示商務物件方法參數的名稱和其關聯的值。

span.span: An of objects that represent the names of the parameters of the business object method and their associated values.

summary.span: 使用指定的輸入參數集合，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified input parameters collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputParameters As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得包含商務物件方法參數和其值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.

value.span: 名稱/值組的 ，表示商務物件方法參數和其對應的值。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依參考或值參數可以傳遞至商務物件方法。Parameters can be passed to the business object method by reference or by value. 如果您使用物件，以便處理， ， ，或事件，您可以存取及管理這些參數使用屬性。If you use an object to handle the , , , or events, you can access and manipulate these parameters using the property. 這個字典中參數的任何變更會影響作業呼叫的方法多載。Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation. 當屬性控制項設定時，您可以修改只的項目，此字典中的資料物件屬性; 您無法加入或移除參數。When the property of the control is set, you can modify only the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 傳址方式傳遞的參數中傳回屬性物件。Parameters that are passed by reference are returned in the property of the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項，控制項，以及數個控制項更新資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 顯示 Northwind 員工的名稱時控制項可用來輸入和更新位址資訊。The displays the name of a Northwind Employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因為屬性包含物件繫結至選取的值控制，觸發程序的按鈕員工選取之後，才會啟用方法。Because the property contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the control, the button that triggers the method is only enabled after an employee is selected. 在此範例中，`NorthwindEmployeeUpdating`方法之前呼叫方法，將正確的參數和值集合。In this example, the `NorthwindEmployeeUpdating` method is called before the method to add the correct parameters and values to the collection. 以動態方式，如下所示，或以宣告方式，您可以加入的參數和值。You can add the parameters and values dynamically, as demonstrated, or declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13/CS/objds13cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13/VB/objds13vb.aspx#1)]
